title: I published my book on Amazon KDP but why doesn't it appear on search? - Quora

response.answer_text: Make sure you get the title right and also add the author’s name. For PRINT BOOKS did you check the EXPANDED DISTRIBUTION box? That gets you into the Ingram Catalog. If you’re searching at Barnes & Noble (Nook) they tend to NOT carry “Independently Published” ISBNs. You need to co-publish (for free) at Nook Books. If you are searching Books a Million on places like that it should show up if you also include the authors name (e.g. MY BOOK TITLE MY NAME). [Once again you have to use EXPANDED DISTRIBUTION to get into the Books A Million data base.] Some retailers won’t carry EROTICA or ADULT ROMANCE, so those won’t get listed at SOME retailers. Allow 7 days from publication for print books to show up. If you are looking for eBooks, they won’t show up anywhere but at Amazon sites. Amazon does not do EXPANDED distribution for eBooks only for print books. You need to co-publish at Smashwords or Draft2Digital

When did you publish it? It can take up to 72 hours to show up on Amazon if you just hit “Publish” today. Also, did you make good use of the Amazon keywords? That is essential to getting your book found by new readers.
